item.description:
Learn about the latest research and share your experiences in raising boys. Facilitated by Andrea and Andy. (There is also a chance we may have a local author and mom as an informal guest speaker.)

*Apologies to Andy & Andrea that this didn't get posted in advance! I hope people can still attend. From the internal email list I believe we already have around a dozen women going.

FYI: Socializing before the meeting starts at 7:15pm. The discussion itself kicks off at 7:30pm and concludes at 9pm. This is a great first Meetup for anyone interested in learning more about the chapter!
item.name: Raising Boys
